text: @WHO Trying a preventive remedy for coronavirus or any virus. As per siddhar system, 1)10g pepper, 2)10g betel leaf, 3)10g papaya leaf, 4)10g Bermuda grass (arugampil). Boil all these in 200ml water and make to 100ml and 1 adult prsn can drink this once in 15-25days.preventive remedy
